item.title: 생새우초밥집
item.description: regal syntex in tex, but not rendered g(X) = \begin{cases} \text{argmin}{x \in X } | x | &, |X| < \infty \\ \text{argmin}{x \in X \cap \mathbb{Z}} |x| &, | X | = \infty \end{cases}: $$ g(X) = \begin{cases} \text{argmin}{x \in X } | x | &, |X| < \infty \\ \text{argmin}{x \in X \cap \mathbb{Z}} |x| &, | X | = \infty \end{cases} $$ regal syntex in tex $\text{argmin}$ 👈 This is a evidence of innocent ‘\text{argmin}’ $$ g(X) = \begin{cases} _{x \in X } | x | &, |X| < \infty \\ _{x \in X \cap \mathbb{Z}} |x| &, | X | = \infty \end{cases}: $$ This is a evidence of innocent complement ‘\text{argmin}’ 👆
